## AnalyticsEvent

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/analytics/constants.ts" sourceLine="30" packageName="commandkit" />

The type of analytics events that can be tracked in CommandKit.
This type is derived from the keys of the `AnalyticsEvents` object.
It ensures that only valid analytics events can be used in the tracking functions.

```ts title="Signature"
type AnalyticsEvent = (typeof AnalyticsEvents)[keyof typeof AnalyticsEvents]
```
